name: native-type-script
description: This project contains a native TypeScript frontend and backend.

scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.install-and-start: npm run install && npm run start

author: Roel van Lisdonk
notes: concurrently is used to run multiple npm scripts in parallel. We don't use npm-run-all, because it has issues on Windows.
ts-node-dev is used to run a node application, written in TypeScript, without transpiling to disk on each change, which makes it much faster.
typescript is used for all frontend and backend coding.
